name: Super-Time-Force
description:
Summary:

Super Time Force is a downloadable arcade-style side-scrolling shooter in which players travel through time to prevent the extinction of dinosaurs. Players will enter several colorful areas, each based in the past, present, or future, with the sole purpose of killing all enemies.

This game is in early-access and expect updates to come soon on guns, mobs and more!

Multiplayer:

In recent development we have created a 2 player maximum concept, so grab a friend and explore each level in a fight against the clock and save each dinosaur before they go extinct.

New Features:

Customisations on each characters including hats, hairstyles, drip and accessories.

Additional maps such as our new castle level with enemies defending from incoming raids.

Lastly our newly released Quantum blaster!
